section.para: To view Return Authorizations by Item, select the "Return Authorizations Lookup by Item" option from the "Reports" menu. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Return Authorizations by Item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Item Number of the Item whose Return Authorizations you want to view. The lookup feature located to the right of the field leads to a searchable list of make and buy items.
